name: Egyptian Pantheon
description: These gods are a young dynasty of an ancient divine family, heirs to the rulership of the cosmos and the maintenance of the divine principle of Ma'at â€” the fundamental order of truth, justice, law, and order that puts gods, mortal pharaohs, and ordinary men and women in their logical and rightful place in the universe.

deities.name: Re-Horakhty
deities.title: God of the Sun, Ruler of the Gods

deities.name: Apep
deities.title: God of Evil, Fire, and Serpents

deities.name: Hathor
deities.title: Goddess of Love, Music, and Motherhood
deities.symbol: Horned cow's head with lunar disk

deities.name: Osiris
deities.title: God of Nature and the Underworld

deities.name: Ptah
deities.title: God of Crafts, Knowledge, and Secrets

deities.name: Set
deities.title: God of Darkness and Desert Storms

deities.name: Sobek
deities.title: God of Water and Crocodiles
deities.symbol: Crocodile head with horns and plumes

source.section: Appendix B: Gods of the Multiverse
